Probably weakly related to old https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=593939, it is unpleasant to see it and only affect windows users, most probably...

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. On OS Windows run some canvas (2D/3D) rendering
2. Press Ctrl+Alt+Del to be system modal dialog displayed
3. Close the modal dialog without any action
Actual Results:  
Canvas area is distorted in ugly way.

Expected Results:  
Should look as it was before

It happens only when HW acceleration (DX9) is turned on, after disabling it everything is fine.
Tested on current by Jeff modified demos:

http://people.mozilla.org/%7Ejmuizelaar/fishie/fishie.html
http://people.mozilla.org/%7Ejmuizelaar/fishie/fishie-gl.html
